```py
from math import factorial as fac
def nameAge(name, age):
	print("Hi, I am", name)
	print("My age is ", age)
    print("Factorial of my age is ", fac(age))

nameAge(name="Prince", age=20)

```

```r
library(package_name)

fac <- function(n) {
  if(n == 0) return(1)
  return(n * fac(n-1))
}

nameAge <- function(name, age) {
  cat("Hi, I am", name, "\n")
  cat("My age is", age, "\n")
  cat("Factorial of my age is", fac(age), "\n")
}

nameAge(name="Prince", age=20)
```
